quest.name: Nut Job
journal: Mogomo has the next step of his perfect garden planned.
Mogomo wants you to get him five kupo nuts so he can grow kupo trees in his garden. Visit Moggzia and ask him if he has any nuts to spare.
Moggzia has agreed to let you gather kupo nuts for Mogomo. Gather five from the trees that dot the surrounding area.
You have found five of the most impressively firm and large kupo nuts in Moghome. Bring them to Mogomo, and make sure to handle them with the same delicate attention you would give your own.
Mogomo is thrilled that his dream garden is one step closer to completion. He wants to eventually trade his kupo nuts to visitors from the surface for their shiny objects and tools.
objectives: Pick kupo nuts from the kupo trees.
Deliver the kupo nuts to Mogomo.

dialogue.name: MOGOMO
dialogue.text: Moghome's upper layer is bathed in sunlight─that's why the kupo trees grow lush and leafy. I think a few would look perfect in my garden!

dialogue.name: MOGOMO
dialogue.text: I only want the best trees─and that means the best kupo nuts! Moggzia tends to the greenery up top. Ask him if he can part with some─five should be enough, kupo!

dialogue.name: MOGOMO
dialogue.text: Only kupo nuts of the highest quality are worth planting in my garden. Ask Moggzia if he knows where we could get any.

dialogue.name: MOGGZIA
dialogue.text: Ah...so Mogomo is in need of kupo nuts? He has been a good friend... Very well, take as many as you need─just pick them straight off the branches, kupo.

dialogue.name: MOGGZIA
dialogue.text: Kupo trees grow all around this area, you simply need to pluck any ripe nuts from their branches, kupo.

dialogue.name: MOGOMO
dialogue.text: The kupo nuts make the tree, and I desire only the best. I trust you to find the biggest nuts you can!

dialogue.name: MOGGZIA
dialogue.text: Were you able to find satisfactory kupo nuts? The ones hanging from these trees are the best Moghome has to offer.

dialogue.name: MOGOMO
dialogue.text: I know Moggzia will pull through in providing only the best! Were you able to find the nuts I require?

dialogue.name: MOGOMO
dialogue.text: My thanks! I couldn't have picked firmer kupo nuts myself. The trees which sprout from these will be the envy of gardeners everywhere.

dialogue.name: MOGOMO
dialogue.text: One day people from the surface will visit Moghome in numbers like never before, bringing shiny tools and other sundries I can barely imagine. On that day, I'll show them my glorious kupo nuts and they'll have no choice but to trade for my superior product. Just you wait, kupo!
